description: Red Twig is a local cafe whose website I made from the ground up at Qudo Creative with oversight from a senior dev. This site includes access to a CMS for the customer to easily change the menu or other aspeccts of the website at ease. I also contributed to the design of the menu and about page.
A website for family and friends to vote and guess the gender of my friend's unborn baby. Results were displayed on a TV and guests voted on their phone at the gender reveal party.

A vanilla JavaScipt memory card flip game! Flip one card over to reveal a photo of a dog or cat, then flip over another card to try and find its pair. Try to match all the cards with their pair before the time runs out!
